title: Is Volkswagen’s 300 MPG Car Banned in the U.S.?
subtitle: Is the federal government preventing Volkswagen's XL1 model car from being sold in the U.S. because the vehicle is too fuel-efficient?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The federal government is preventing Volkswagen’s XL1 model car from being sold in the U.S. because the vehicle is too fuel-efficient.
